author: aelwood
body: Split up the alphaT HLT DQM module and HLT Filter into two new pull requests (as suggested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6003/). Rearranged the HLTrigger/JetMET module slightly to allow for the use of the AlphaT class in other modules
title: Alpha T DQM module for 72X
